Articles.Content:
So I noticed both KER and stock show that my AP drops even though I am above 70k. My mods are following:

  • ClickthroughBlocker
  • toolbarControl
  • Craftmanager
  • EVE
  • KER
  • KerbalKonstructs
  • HyperEdit
  • KVV
  • NavBallDocking
  • DockingBallAlignment
  • RCSBuildAid
  • Scatterer
  • Stagerecovery
  • SVE
  • Trajectories
  • ModuleManager

Which one caused the problem?

None of these mods affects the physics of the game but there is a game settings called "Orbital Drift Compensation" which may cause this behaviour if you've disabled it. You can find it in the "General" settings.
